column4: m using Edgy 6.10 and totally new to linux, so is there any way of upgrading to 7.10 without remove this 6.10?
you have to update to 7.04 before 7.10 gksu update-manager then refresh and it should say new release and update to feisty
thanks, but what if want to upgrde from a CD?
get the alternative cd and it has an upgrade option
